title: Live Chat Support Agent – WFH (PHP 18K – 25K!)
job_overview:
No Calls! Just Chat & Earn! Hiring Now!

Join our team as a Live Chat Support Agent—help customers via chat, no phone calls! Work from home & enjoy high bonuses!

? Your Role:

Assist customers via website chat, Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp

Solve basic inquiries (orders, tracking, refunds)

Must reply within 5 mins every 20 mins

? Skills Needed:

Fast typing (at least 25 WPM)

Knows Shopee, Lazada, or e-commerce? Big plus!

???? PHP 18,000 – 25,000/month + incentives!
???? WFH – Choose your own schedule!
???? Apply now—immediate hiring!
